## Change Logs

**Attention**: This beta version is set as _latest release_ in GitHub. Beta versions will receive updates until the official release. If you find bugs, please open an [issue on GitHub](https://github.com/Electron-Minecraft-Launcher/EML-AdminTool-v2/issues).

> [!CAUTION]
> Upgrading from `v2.0.0-beta.5` to `v2.0.0-beta.6` involves a breaking change in the database system (PostgreSQL 18). **Please follow [this migration guide](https://github.com/Electron-Minecraft-Launcher/EML-AdminTool-v2/.github/guides/migrate-postgres.md) before performing the update.**

> [!WARNING]
> Updating from `v2.0.0-beta.4` requires to manually add a file to your installation (see instructions below).

### Changes

* _Bootstraps_ option now uses Electron Updater instead of a custom solution.
* Updated PostgreSQL to version 18. **This is a breaking change. Please follow [this migration guide](https://github.com/Electron-Minecraft-Launcher/EML-AdminTool-v2/.github/guides/migrate-postgres.md) before performing the update.**
* Updated Prisma to version 7.

### Bug fixes and improvements

* Limimting the risk of infinite loading after setup or resetting the application.
* Allowing to upload large files (such as large modpacks) by increasing the request size limit.

### Known issues

* Low-quality internet (such as phone tethering) connection may cause external API calls to fail.
* Error page/notification does not always display the corresponding error message.
* Translations are wrongly displayed in some parts of the application.

## How to upgrade

### First-time setup

Please follow [this guide](https://github.com/Electron-Minecraft-Launcher/EML-AdminTool-v2/?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) to install EML AdminTool for the first time.

### Upgrading from a previous version

Make sure that Docker is installed on your server, and the default Docker socket is available at `/var/run/docker.sock`.

#### Upgrading from `v2.0.0-beta.5` to `v2.0.0-beta.6`

Follow [this guide](https://github.com/Electron-Minecraft-Launcher/EML-AdminTool-v2/.github/guides/migrate-postgres.md) to migrate your database before performing the update.

#### Upgrading from `v2.0.0-beta.4` to `v2.0.0-beta.6`

1. Connect to your server via SSH and navigate to the EML AdminTool compose file (usually located at `~/.eml/admintool/docker-compose.prod.yml`).
2. Create a file named `.env` and add the following content:
   ```env
   NODE_ENV=production
   ORIGIN=https://YOUR_DOMAIN
   ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost:8080,http://127.0.0.1:8080,http://YOUR_DOMAIN,https://YOUR_DOMAIN
   ```
   Replace `YOUR_DOMAIN` with the actual domain or IP address (and port) where your EML AdminTool is hosted. Make sure to include the correct protocol (`http` or `https`).
   Save and close the file.
3. **Finish the update by following [this guide](https://github.com/Electron-Minecraft-Launcher/EML-AdminTool-v2/.github/guides/migrate-postgres.md) to migrate your database.**

Please note that EML AdminTool will not be available during the update process. We recommend that you perform the update during off-peak hours to minimize disruption to your users.
